column4: Hello - I trying to setup a Ubuntu server on a Dell mini 1012 (1gb Ram, 1tb drive) - Is 12.4 my best bet? any recommendations?
I'd recommend latest LTS (supported for 5 years after release), which is 12.04 :)
if more recent packaging is more important than long term support, then you could go with 12.10 (supported for 18 months after release)
